title: There are some serious connection issues happening, at least with ARAM
body: I was just in a game where 3 of my teammates didn't stop disconnecting/reconnecting for the ENTIRE GAME. And at one point my ping went up to almost 4000. Also there was a game earlier where pretty much my entire team's ping wouldn't go below 80. There has to be some DDOSing happening right now, either that or the server needs some hardcore maintenance.

replies.body: Why isn't this getting the attention it needs? I'm one that has the issue of reconnecting and disconnecting, and it's happening on all modes. Haven't tried in ranked tho for obvious reasons. Please look into this issue.
I'm not seeing anything out of the ordinary here, I'm curious if there might have been an ISP issue.  Is this still happening?

It's currently happening to me if you can help, but my best guess is just that my ISP got screwed over by the hurricane

Oh no!  Are there any status updates from your local ISP support?  The best way to know is by running a traceroute to the game server.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and route to the NA game server 104.160.131.1 for about 5 minutes.  Let me know what you find.

This is perfect, thanks!  Looking at this, right off the bat you're having some heavy connection issues before leaving your own network.  I highly recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection, then test it in a custom game.
Im having the same problem.... c:

I just finished a game and started a new one. Now i get "Unable to connect to server" and it won't let me in the game. I restarted the client to see if it worked. restarted my router to see if it worked. I checked other games to see if i could connect there and that worked. Just no league again. It's extremely frustrating knowing i could get placed in low priority ques. For something that isn't my fault.
